description: Introduces the Yiddish language. Students learn to speak and to ask others in Yiddish about themselves and about common situations (the classroom, work, family), and learn to read and write simple Yiddish texts.
fulldesc:
YIDD 1 First-Year Yiddish
Introduces the Yiddish language. Students learn to speak and to ask others in Yiddish about themselves and about common situations (the classroom, work, family), and learn to read and write simple Yiddish texts.
Credits 5
Instructor The Staff
Quarter Offered Winter

description: Follows YIDD 1, expanding vocabulary to include the weather, physical health and sickness, holidays, clothing, etc., and increasing student ability for self-expression using different tenses and grammatical cases.
extrarequirements: Requirements Prerequisite(s): YIDD 1 or by consent of instructor.
fulldesc:
YIDD 2 First-Year Yiddish
Follows YIDD 1, expanding vocabulary to include the weather, physical health and sickness, holidays, clothing, etc., and increasing student ability for self-expression using different tenses and grammatical cases.
Credits 5
Instructor The Staff
Requirements Prerequisite(s): YIDD 1 or by consent of instructor.
Quarter Offered Spring

description: Follows YIDD 2, expanding vocabulary to include food, travel, and academic life, with an emphasis on the expression of feelings and opinions, agreement and disagreement, making use of all tenses and all grammatical cases.
extrarequirements: Requirements Prerequisite(s): YIDD 2 or by permission of the instructor.
fulldesc:
YIDD 3 First-Year Yiddish
Follows YIDD 2, expanding vocabulary to include food, travel, and academic life, with an emphasis on the expression of feelings and opinions, agreement and disagreement, making use of all tenses and all grammatical cases.
Credits 5
Instructor The Staff
Requirements Prerequisite(s): YIDD 2 or by permission of the instructor.

description: Students submit petition to sponsoring agency.
fulldesc:
YIDD 99F Tutorial
Students submit petition to sponsoring agency.
Credits 2
Repeatable For Credit Yes
Quarter Offered Fall, Winter, Spring
